author: vincenzo
msg: Any java.lang.Error thrown by a matcher or a mailet was ending up with the mail message being lost, instead of being sent to the Mail.ERROR processor.

author: vincenzo
msg: Was getting a NPE in getTo(Mail) when SpecialAddress.SENDER was returned by getTo(), and the sender was null. Fixed together with a better "fail over", also when SpecialAddress.RETURN_PATH was returned.
